This song is encourage me all the day when I was in training at Med Shool, the most hard time of our trial. Jesus, Jesus, Jesus! Before that trial, I didn't call the Lord because I was capaple to do everything easily. But I was so happy to call on the Lord. Now, in my hardworking and depressions, finally just calling became not easygoing. Every time I do something to the patient, I say from deep in my heart, Jesus, Jesus, Jesus!
